item.content:encoded:
Source: https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/lores-black-edition.19290/
We use this simple plugin to easily add custom lore’s to items.
LoresÂ is a plugin that will allow server admins to change the name and lore of an item easily.
â€‹
FEATURES:
– Support to add multiple lores on items
– Support for lore colors.
– Change the name of a head.
– Change the name of an item.
– Change the lore of an item.
– Insert lines of lore into the lore of an item.
– Delete lines of lore from the lore of an item.
– Clear the lore of an item.

COMMANDS – PERMISSIONS:
–Â /lore nameÂ <text> – Set the new name for an item.â€‹

–Â /lore ownerÂ <player name> – Change the owner of a head.
–Â /lore addÂ <text> – Add a line to the lore.
–Â /lore setÂ <line #> <text> – Change a line from the lore.
–Â /lore insertÂ <line #> <text> – Insert a line into the lore.
–Â /lore deleteÂ [line #] – Delete a line of the lore. (last line by default)
–Â /lore clearÂ – Clear all lines of the lore.
–Â /lore undoÂ – Undoes your last modification.
lores.loreÂ – Needed to modify an item’s lore
lores.nameÂ – Needed to modify an item’s name
lores.ownerÂ – Needed to modify an skull’s owner
lores.colorÂ – Needed to add color codes to lores/names
lores.formatÂ – Needed to add format codes to lores
lores.adminÂ – Parent node for all permissions

REQUIREMENTS:
There are no requirements for runningÂ Lores.

CONFIGURATION:
There is no configuration for this plugin.

SUPPORTED VERSIONS:
LoresÂ should work on every version from 1.7Â toÂ 1.12.

DONATIONS:
If you like what I did on this plugin, please donate me a cent or more atÂ twix_seby@yahoo.comÂ (PayPal), and I’ll add you at the Donators list.
What you need to do, is add your Spigot name in the donation text so I put you up. [PayPalÂ takes up some money for the donation, so if you donate something big, it will be perfect.] –Â ???Â [No one cares, yay!] –Â ???Â [No one cares, yay!] –Â ???Â [No one cares, yay!]

WARNING:
If you find any bugs, please do not give a bad review. Instead , just PM me about the bug and I’ll fix it. I’ll also add you to the next update title, if you reported the bug.
Please test this version and report any errors in PM/Discussions tab.
These versions are made for server use.

SUGGESTIONS:
I am not open to suggestions.

DOWNLOAD GOALS:
Goal PageÂ #3 [1,000Â ->Â 2,000]
1,000 – THIS IS INCREDIBLE! – Done!
1,100 – I can’t thank you guys enough. – Done!
1,200 – This was honestly the best thing ever. – Done!
1,300 – I thank you so much. – Done!
1,400 – This seriously is unbelievable. – Done!
1,600 – HOLY CRAP DUDE! – Done!
1,700 – … – Done!
1,800 – … –Â waiting…
1,900 – … –Â waiting…
2,000Â – … –Â waiting…

SPECIAL THANKS:â€‹

YouÂ –Â downloading thisÂ â€‹
@WorlfyÂ –Â LoreAttributesRecodedÂ (thanks for the collab)
